hub.description: Returns all The Hub public information

welcome.description: Welcome a new user to the discord!

restricted_words.description: Returns a complete list of Restricted Words

suggest.description: Send a suggestion to the developers! MAX 1024 CHARACTERS

help.description: Returns a paginator embed of the commands available to your highest ranking role.

none.description: There are currently no moderator commands available

ping.description: Test the response time of the bot

purge.description: Remove n number of message(s) from the channel, or from the user in the channel, the command is executed in. USER AND AMOUNT ARE OPTIONAL! BE CAREFUL WITH THIS COMMAND!

get_suggestions.description: Displays a paginator embed of all currently open suggestions

restart.description: Allows the Owners to restart the Mek's Hub discord bot

restricted_words.description: Allows staff to add/remove words to the Restricted Words list.
